 .----------------------------- r e l e a s e info --------------------------+
 -  Your sister is missing. On the bright side, you have a flying dragon.    '
 '
    Diadra Empty  is  a free-roaming shoot-'em-up on a grand scale. Take the
 `  role of Nyalra and her faithful dragon Minimi in a fantastical quest  to
 `  save her missing sister, and battle legions  of  monsters  and  menacing
 `  bosses. The  touching  storyline is complemented by the game's beautiful
 .  2D visuals, particle effects and  environments  rife  with  enemies, and
 :  glowing  projectiles.   Diadra   Empty   gives  you  extreme  speed  and
 |  maneuverability, huge environments in which to seize the upper hand, and
 |  plenty of firepower and  upgrades. You  always  have  options,  and  the
 |  immensely  detailed on-screen radar will help you keep track of even the
 |  off-screen chaos.
 |
 |  You'll find what you're looking for with Diadra Empty.
 |
 |  Features :
 |
 |  Ã‚Âº Ride on top of a dragon and destroy creatures in a fantasy setting.
 |  Ã‚Âº Gorgeous 2D visuals, supports "full-screen" and 1024x768 window modes.
 |  Ã‚Âº Six open-arena free-roaming stages, plus unlockable stages.
 |  Ã‚Âº Shoot-'em-up with a unique RPG upgrade system.
 |  Ã‚Âº Highly customizable weapon system, over 72 combinations available.
 |  Ã‚Âº Languages: English, French/FranÃƒÂ§ais, German/Deutsch.

This is a scene Release and a 0 day application
To Extract
First select all the zip files by dragging your mouse over them. Then unzip them to a different folder. At the new folder you will find a set of rars .Do the exact same procedure as the zips but this time select the extract here option.
That should do it. If you are having trouble with the rars upgrade your winrar to version 5.
